2. Locate the product: Look for the instant noodles section in the grocery store. It is usually located near the canned goods or pasta sections.

3. Walk towards the product: Once you have located the instant noodles, walk towards it. Make sure to maintain a stable and safe walking pace.

4. Reach for the product: When you reach for the instant noodles, make sure to use your dominant hand and keep your other hand close by in case you need to reach for something else.

6. Pay for the product: Once you have selected the instant noodles, pay for them at the checkout counter.

7. Carry the product: After paying for the product, carry it to your desired location in the store, such as the checkout area or your car.
